title: Senate NDAA directs independent review how the Space Force acquires technologies
summary: In its proposed 2023 National Defense Authorization Act, the Senate Armed Services Committee directs the Pentagon’s outside business advisors to review the acquisition process for space programs

title: Watch live: SLS moon rocket booster ready for test-firing in Utah
summary: Northrop Grumman is set to test-fire a full-scale booster for NASA’s Space Launch System Thursday in Utah, a test designed to validate a new motor ignitor and steering system for use on future versions of the giant moon rocket.

title: Satellite Vu orders second satellite for tracking heat waste
summary: British Earth observation startup Satellite Vu has ordered a second satellite from Surrey Satellite Technology Ltd. (SSTL) for its planned thermal imaging constellation.

title: NASA, ESA to Discuss Mars Sample Return Mission
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference at 11 a.m. EDT on Wednesday, July 27, to discuss the architecture for its Mars Sample Return campaign.

title: Watch live: Russian cosmonaut, European astronaut head outside ISS on spacewalk
summary: Russian cosmonaut Oleg Artemyev and European astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti headed outside the International Space Station on a spacewalk Thursday to continue outfitting a European robotic arm and deploy 10 nanosatellites for radio technology experiments.
